result.name: seawater-temperature-records-for-the-uk-shelf-all-cefas-seawater-temperature-data-1880-2014
result.notes:
This dataset combines the 17 Cefas Data Sources described separately into a 
single file containing over 10 million records. Data sources include the Cefas 
Coastal Temperature Network, Fishing Survey System, Oceanographic Archive, 
Plankton Survey System, Ferry Route and Ferry Box data, SmartBuoy & Defra 
WaveNet data, data from divers and fish tags, the Lowestoft Sample management 
System, specialist cruises and research projects, ScanFish and deployed 
equipment mounted CTD loggers. The Main area covered is the UK Continental 
Shelf with data as far west as Greenland and east as Svalbard.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Seawater temperature records for the UK Shelf - "all" Cefas Seawater Temperature Data 1880 - 2014
